name: Carrot Grabber
description:
Hello Every One

This my first game on itch.io . I hope you enjoy to play it and please kindly leave me your feedback to help me improve the game.

This game is like runner  with 50 levels , there is a rabbit as player to grab all fruits and vegetable and must be care full to dont be trap by other animals.

how to play :
move : arrow keys
F : Full screen button

Credit :
Animals Art by  LYASeek [thank you for your amazing pixel art Animals]
Link you LYASeek page : https://lyaseek.itch.io/

Thank you for your play, feedback and support in advance from all of you my friends
